title: IndieLeap Team Roles and Responsibilities
description: Detailed description of key team roles and their responsibilities in the IndieLeap platform development, including Product Owner, Project Manager, Architect, UI/UX Designer, Front-End Developer, Back-End Developer, QA, and DevOps positions.
author: William Roberts
preview: Detailed description of the IndieLeap development team roles, including Poppy (Product Owner), Penny (Project Manager), Archie (Architect), Desi (UI/UX Designer), Freddy (Front-End Developer), Betty (Back-End Developer), Quincy (QA), and Danny (DevOps).
